paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. The main window contains a main menu with two entries (File and Format).

The main window also has a blue LABEL that contains a context menu, that is the clone of "Format" in the main menu. Right click on the LABEL and a context menu will appear
